description: The executive officer of the Tuatha de Danaan. He holds Tessa, the battle group commander, in high esteem and trusts her, serving as her aide and assisting her with regards to the battle group. A born and bred English gentleman, he is a loyal subject who serves his queen, Tessa. Due to his overly serious, inflexible and humorless nature, some of the people in Mithril address him familiarly as "Dick". (Naturally, he dislikes it.)
name: Richard Mardukas
